bill.summary:
This bill amends the Federal Power Act to revise the criteria for a facility to qualify as a qualifying conduit hydropower facility.
Under current law, a hydropower facility must have a capacity that does not exceed five megawatts.This bill eliminates such requirement.
Additionally, the bill revises the timeframe for an entity to contest whether their hydroelectric facility meets the qualifying criteria.
